fields.name: ebuf
docs: Reserved.

fields.name: isScheduled
docs: Whether the function is invoked on a schedule or by request

fields.name: isTriggered
docs: Whether the function has been manually triggered with the function_trigger instruction

fields.name: permissions
docs: The function permissions granted by the attestation_queue.authority

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump.

fields.name: creatorSeed
docs: The payer who originally created the function. Cannot change, used to derive PDA.

fields.name: name
docs: The name of the function for easier identification.

fields.name: metadata
docs: The metadata of the function for easier identification.

fields.name: createdAtSlot
docs: The Solana slot when the function was created. (PDA)

fields.name: createdAt
docs: The unix timestamp when the function was created.

fields.name: updatedAt
docs: The unix timestamp when the function config (container, registry, version, or schedule) was changed.

fields.name: enclave
docs: The enclave quote

fields.name: mrEnclaves
docs: An array of permitted mr_enclave measurements for the function.

fields.name: containerRegistry
docs: The off-chain registry to fetch the function container from.

fields.name: container
docs: The identifier of the container in the given container_registry.

fields.name: version
docs: The version tag of the container to pull.

fields.name: paramsSchema
docs: The expected schema for the container params.

fields.name: defaultContainerParams
docs: The default params passed to the container during scheduled execution.

fields.name: authority
docs: The authority of the function which is authorized to make account changes.

fields.name: attestationQueue
docs: The address of the AttestationQueueAccountData that will be processing function requests and verifying the function measurements.

fields.name: queueIdx
docs: An incrementer used to rotate through an AttestationQueue's verifiers.

fields.name: addressLookupTable
docs: The address_lookup_table of the function used to increase the number of accounts we can fit into a function result.

fields.name: schedule
docs: The cron schedule to run the function on.

fields.name: lastExecutionTimestamp
docs: The unix timestamp when the function was last run.

fields.name: nextAllowedTimestamp
docs: The unix timestamp when the function is allowed to run next.

fields.name: triggerCount
docs: The number of times to trigger the function upon the next invocation.

fields.name: triggeredSince
docs: Time this function has been sitting in an explicitly triggered state

fields.name: permissionExpiration
docs: UNUSED. The unix timestamp when the current permissions expire.

fields.name: numRequests
docs: Number of requests created for this function. Used to prevent closing when there are live requests.

fields.name: requestsDisabled
docs: Whether custom requests have been disabled for this function.

fields.name: requestsRequireAuthorization
docs: Whether new requests need to be authorized by the FunctionAccount authority before being initialized.
Useful if you want to use CPIs to control request account creation.

fields.name: reserved1
docs: DEPRECATED.

fields.name: requestsFee
docs: The lamports paid to the FunctionAccount escrow on each successful update request.

fields.name: escrowWallet
docs: The SwitchboardWallet that will handle pre-funding rewards paid out to function runners.

fields.name: escrowTokenWallet
docs: The escrow_wallet TokenAccount that handles pre-funding rewards paid out to function runners.

fields.name: rewardEscrowWallet
docs: The SwitchboardWallet that will handle acruing rewards from requests.
Defaults to the escrow_wallet.

fields.name: rewardEscrowTokenWallet
docs: The reward_escrow_wallet TokenAccount used to acrue rewards from requests made with custom parameters.

fields.name: ebuf
docs: Reserved.

fields.name: isTriggered
docs: Whether the request is ready to be processed.

fields.name: status
docs: The status of the current request.

fields.name: authority
docs: Signer allowed to cancel the request.

fields.name: payer
docs: The default destination for rent exemption when the account is closed.

fields.name: function
docs: The function that can process this request

fields.name: escrow
docs: The tokenAccount escrow

fields.name: attestationQueue
docs: The Attestation Queue for this request.

fields.name: activeRequest
docs: The current active request.

fields.name: previousRequest
docs: The previous request.

fields.name: maxContainerParamsLen
docs: The maximum number of bytes to pass to the container params.

fields.name: containerParamsHash
docs: Hash of the serialized container_params to prevent RPC tampering.
Should be verified within your function to ensure you are using the correct parameters.

fields.name: containerParams
docs: The stringified container params to pass to the function.

fields.name: createdAt
docs: The unix timestamp when the function was created.

fields.name: garbageCollectionSlot
docs: The slot when the account can be garbage collected and closed by anyone for a portion of the rent.

fields.name: ebuf
docs: Reserved.

fields.name: enclave
docs: Represents the state of the quote verifiers enclave.

fields.name: authority
docs: The authority of the EnclaveAccount which is permitted to make account changes.

fields.name: attestationQueue
docs: Queue used for attestation to verify a MRENCLAVE measurement.

fields.name: createdAt
docs: The unix timestamp when the quote was created.

fields.name: isOnQueue
docs: Whether the quote is located on the AttestationQueues buffer.

fields.name: lastHeartbeat
docs: The last time the quote heartbeated on-chain.

fields.name: rewardEscrow
docs: The SwitchboardWallet account containing the reward escrow for verifying quotes on-chain.
We should set this whenever the operator changes so we dont need to pass another account and can verify with has_one.

fields.name: stakeWallet
docs: The SwitchboardWallet account containing the queues required min_stake.
Needs to be separate from the reward_escrow. Allows easier 3rd party management of stake from rewards.

fields.name: ebuf
docs: Reserved.

fields.name: authority
docs: The address of the authority which is permitted to add/remove allowed enclave measurements.

fields.name: mrEnclaves
docs: Allowed enclave measurements.

fields.name: mrEnclavesLen
docs: The number of allowed enclave measurements.

fields.name: data
docs: The addresses of the quote verifiers who have a valid
verification status and have heartbeated on-chain recently.

fields.name: dataLen
docs: The length of valid quote verifiers for the given attestation queue.

fields.name: allowAuthorityOverrideAfter
docs: Allow authority to force add a node after X seconds with no heartbeat.

fields.name: requireAuthorityHeartbeatPermission
docs: Even if a heartbeating machine quote verifies with proper measurement,
require authority signoff.

fields.name: requireUsagePermissions
docs: Require FunctionAccounts to have PermitQueueUsage before they are executed.

fields.name: maxQuoteVerificationAge
docs: The maximum allowable time until a EnclaveAccount needs to be re-verified on-chain.

fields.name: reward
docs: The reward paid to quote verifiers for attesting on-chain.

fields.name: lastHeartbeat
docs: The unix timestamp when the last quote verifier heartbeated on-chain.

fields.name: currIdx
docs: Incrementer used to track the current quote verifier permitted to run any available functions.

fields.name: gcIdx
docs: Incrementer used to garbage collect and remove stale quote verifiers.

fields.name: verifierMinStake
docs: The minimum number of lamports a quote verifier needs to lock-up in order to heartbeat and verify other quotes.

fields.name: functionMinStake
docs: The minimum number of lamports a function needs to lock-up in order to use a queues resources.

fields.name: ebuf
docs: Reserved.

fields.name: status
docs: The status of the request.

fields.name: bounty
docs: The SOL bounty in lamports used to incentivize a verifier to expedite the request.

fields.name: requestSlot
docs: The slot the request was published

fields.name: fulfilledSlot
docs: The slot when the request was fulfilled

fields.name: expirationSlot
docs: The slot when the request will expire and be able to be closed by the non-authority account

fields.name: verifier
docs: The EnclaveAccount who verified the enclave for this request

fields.name: enclaveSigner
docs: The keypair generated in the enclave and required to sign any
valid transactions processed by the function.

fields.name: validAfterSlot
docs: The slot when the request can first be executed.

fields.name: ebuf
docs: Reserved.

fields.name: enclaveSigner
docs: The address of the signer generated within an enclave.

fields.name: mrEnclave
docs: The quotes MRENCLAVE measurement dictating the contents of the secure enclave.

fields.name: verificationStatus
docs: The VerificationStatus of the quote.

fields.name: verificationTimestamp
docs: The unix timestamp when the quote was last verified.

fields.name: validUntil
docs: The unix timestamp when the quotes verification status expires.

fields.name: quoteRegistry
docs: The off-chain registry where the verifiers quote can be located.

fields.name: registryKey
docs: Key to lookup the buffer data on IPFS or an alternative decentralized storage solution.

fields.name: ebuf
docs: Reserved.

errors.name: InvalidQuote
errors.msg: The provided enclave quote is invalid

errors.name: QuoteExpired
errors.msg: The EnclaveAccount has expired and needs to be reverified

errors.name: QueueFull
errors.msg: The provided queue is full and cannot support new verifiers

errors.name: InvalidEnclaveSigner
errors.msg: The provided enclave_signer does not match the expected enclave_signer on the EnclaveAccount

errors.name: MrEnclavesEmpty
errors.msg: This account has zero mr_enclaves defined

errors.name: MrEnclaveAlreadyExists
errors.msg: The MrEnclave value already exists in the array

errors.name: MrEnclaveDoesntExist
errors.msg: The MrEnclave value was not found in the whitelist

errors.name: MrEnclaveAtCapacity
errors.msg: This account has a full mr_enclaves array. Remove some measurements to make room for new ones

errors.name: PermissionDenied
errors.msg: The PermissionAccount is missing the required flags for this action. Check the queues config to see which permissions are required

errors.name: InvalidAddressLookupAddress
errors.msg: The provided address_lookup_address did not match the expected address on-chain

errors.name: InvalidQueue
errors.msg: The provided attestation queue address did not match the expected address on-chain

errors.name: InvalidAuthority
errors.msg: The provided authority account does not match the expected value on-chain

errors.name: RequestExpired
errors.msg: The requests expirationSlot has expired

errors.name: InsufficientFunds
errors.msg: The escrow has insufficient funds for this action

errors.name: MissingFunctionEscrow
errors.msg: The FunctionAccount escrow is required if function.requests_fee is greater than zero

errors.name: InvalidRequest
errors.msg: The provided requestSlot did not match the expected requestSlot on-chain. The request may have already been processed

errors.name: FunctionNotReady
errors.msg: The FunctionAccount status is not active (1)

errors.name: UserRequestsDisabled
errors.msg: The FunctionAccount has set requests_disabled to true and disabled this action

errors.name: MissingFunctionAuthority
errors.msg: The FunctionAccount authority is required to sign if function.requests_require_authorization is enabled

errors.name: FunctionCloseNotReady
errors.msg: The FunctionAccount must have no requests before it can be closed

errors.name: RequestAlreadyInitialized
errors.msg: Attempting to initialize an already created FunctionRequestAccount

errors.name: FunctionRequestNotReady
errors.msg: The FunctionRequestAccount is not ready to be verified
